name: Secrets of Atlantis
description:
Explore each underwater world looking for treasure. Pick up the golden artefacts and take them home. Avoid fish and keep an eye out for secrets!

NB. World 3 can be played with a subscription to Coil
When web monetization is active, a green icon will appear at the top left of the menu screen.

Made for The Web Monetization Challenge 2020

Follow me on Twitter
